headerText: The `v-chip-group` supercharges the `v-chip` component by providing groupable functionality. It is used for creating groups of selections using chips.

usage.desc: Chip groups make it easy for users to select filtering options for more complex implementations. By default `v-chip-group` will overflow to the right but can be changed to a **column** only mode.

toothbrush.desc: Chip groups allow the creation of custom interfaces that perform the same actions as an item group or radio controls, but are stylistically different.

filterResults.desc: Easily create chip groups that provide additional feedback with the **filter** prop. This creates an alternative visual style that communicates to the user that the chip is selected.

blouse.desc: The `v-chip` component can have an explicit value used for its model. This gets passed to the `v-chip-group` component and is useful for when you don't want to use the chips index as their values.

props.appendIcon: The icon used in the append slot (if shown)
props.column: Remove horizontal pagination and wrap items as needed
props.prependIcon: This icon used in the prepend slot (if shown)
props.showArrows: Force the display of the pagination errors
